set(

  include/processor.h
  include/version.h
  source/controller.cpp
  source/factory.cpp

set(target Karaoke271)
smtg_add_vst3plugin(${target} ${plugin_sources})

# Generated by image/slider_handle.html

smtg_add_vst3_resource(${target} "image/slider_handle_3x.png")

# Generated by image/checkbox.html
smtg_add_vst3_resource(${target} "image/checkbox_1x.png")
smtg_add_vst3_resource(${target} "image/checkbox_2x.png")
smtg_add_vst3_resource(${target} "image/checkbox_3x.png")

# VST3 snapshot
smtg_add_vst3_snapshot(${target} "image/8567c12b46d243cfabf06c9c339f73c5_snapshot_1x.png")

# main view

if(SMTG_MAC)
  smtg_set_bundle(${target} INFOPLIST "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/resource/Info.plist" PREPROCESS)
